title: Tour de France Stage 4: Poga훾ar Powers into Yellow with Sledgehammer Galibier Attack
content:
'I wanted to hit hard today': Poga훾ar uncorks monster attack to drop Vingegaard, Carapaz and the GC 'bigs', moves 45 seconds clear in the classification battle.

Read the full article at Tour de France Stage 4: Poga훾ar Powers into Yellow with Sledgehammer Galibier Attack on Velo.
author: Jim Cotton
